age.description: The age of the patient in years.

sex.description: Sex of the patient. Possible values: '1' for Male, '0' for Female.

cp.description: The type of chest pain experienced by the patient. Possible values: 0 - typical angina, 1 - atypical angina, 2 - non-anginal pain, 3 - asymptomatic.

trtbps.description: The resting blood pressure in mm Hg.

fbs.description: Whether fasting blood sugar is greater than 120 mg/dl. Possible values: '1' for Yes, '0' for No.

restecg.description: The result of the resting electrocardiogram test. Possible values: 0 - normal, 1 - ST-T wave abnormality, 2 - left ventricular hypertrophy.

thalachh.description: The maximum heart rate achieved by the patient.

exng.description: Whether the patient has exercise-induced angina. Possible values: '1' for Yes, '0' for No.

oldpeak.description: The ST depression caused by activity compared to rest.

slp.full_name: Slope of the peak exercise ST segment
slp.description: The slope of the peak exercise ST segment. Possible values: 0 - downsloping, 1 - flat, 2 - upsloping.

caa.description: The number of major vessels (0-3) colored by fluoroscopy.

thall.description: The type of thalassemia. Possible values: 0 - normal, 1 - fixed defect, 2 - reversable defect.
